data.message: I am a huge Ed Sheeran fan. I love his music and this prize would make me so happy. I have been to see him a few times but have always been close to the back - the atmosphere is still incredible - but I'd love to go to one of his gigs where I could see him play properly!! Having been very poorly for the last few years and in and out of hospital, I think this would definitely be a huge treat for me after a rough few years! Please pick me!!! #sheerio
